title: New stainless steel appliances, new countertops, new carpet!!
map_address: 572 potomac st near peoria and potomac
posting_body: Want more info on this unit?
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 650 Sq.
Welcome to your new home at Edge at Fitzsimons Apartments, located in Aurora Colorado!
Edge at Fitzsimons Apartments is a unique community that offers a peaceful refuge from everyday life.
We offer one and two bedroom floorplans that include private balconies/patios.
Each home is designed to include all include a cozy wood burning fireplace, and we have upgraded many apartments to include BRAND NEW faux wood floors, 2-toned paint, stainless steel appliances.
Your new pet-friendly home includes a heated swimming pool onsite laundry facility, and coming soon a bark park and internet cafe.
We also accept package deliveries at the office, so you can rest assured knowing your deliveries will arrive to you safely each time.

Located near downtown Denver and DIA, you will find yourself surrounded by many popular restaurants and conveniences including, the newly finished Peoria Station Light Rail, Aurora Hills Golf Course, and Del Mar Pool and Splash Park.
The new Fitzsimmons Hospital District is also just around the corner from home.
Come experience the Edge at Fitzsimons Lifestyle for yourself.
Our professional onsite team is waiting to welcome you home!
Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.
